Tic-Tac-Toe Online
  • Home

About Tic-Tac-Toe Online

A modern rendition of my favorite childhood game; tictactoe. Through the integration of technology, I was able to create an online version of a classic game. Scroll to the bottom of this page to take a look at my motivation for embarking on this project!

View Demonstration!

Demonstration

To play the game, visit TicTacToe Online and create a room. Ask a friend to join the same room that you created. And play as many rounds of the game as you like! If you would like to test this application on your own then simply open 2 browser windows and join the same room!


Note: the app may take a minute to load!

Learnings

Like most of my other early web projects, this was built with the objective of making something interesting but also, learning a new web technology along the way. After having completed a few web development courses online, I was still unsure of how live chat or online games worked. As such I embarked on this one day build using React.js and Node.js to learn more about web sockets.
